summary: Changes the Steel Smithing perk so that it also improves iron armor and weapons and changes its name and description to fit its new effect.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the Steel Smithing perk so that it also improves iron weapons and armor. and changes its name and description to fit its new effect.

After playing with smithing around a bit, i found it a bit inmersion breaking that a character is able to temper a draedric armor/weapons to reach legendary status but he cant even properly temper an iron helmet (and its one of the most badass looking helmet in the game).
author: Mrpnut08
